name: House of Bread
description:
There are breads in this house. Pet them as much as possibly can. There will be more breads and 25 extra seconds after petting all of them before the time limit.

House of Bread

this game is my first 3D game made for 

libGDX Jam 23

Controls

Mouse = look around

Left Mouse Button = interact

Enter = start the game

Assets

Music from Wowie Resource Pack by Jonas Tyroller (itch.io)

Artwork by Me

3D modeling by Me
